summary:
Huntsman style custom Long Bows, with amazing new features
Features proper string rigging
And proper female draw length
descriptionHtml:
[color=#dd7e6b][font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]First;[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]This mod is NOT an edit of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57870/?]The Huntsman by InsanitySorrow[/url][/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]This is a completely new mod, built from the ground up.[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]Some of the textures used in this mod ARE by InsanitySorrow, and are used with permission.


Nock to tip users: you do not need this mod, as it is now included.[/i][/b][/size][/font][/color]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]This mod adds new Recurve Long Bows to Skyrim, that have been modeled after the Huntsman Bow, found here on SkyrimNexus. Â The Huntsman is a good mod, with a beautifully design bow, but the mod itself has some issues. [/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]The goal of this mod, is to deliver a bow that looks equal to the Huntsman, but sidesteps the issues.[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]In total, six new bows have been added. Each have their own stats, and are fully upgradable. The bows each have a custom appearance, and for the first time, have full support for both genders. That means, finally females can draw a bow with proper form just like the males. No more string floating in front of the feathers at full draw.[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]Each Long Bow also features properly rigged draw string meshes. Even with their longer size, the strings will not bend and corner during draws. Every bow added by the mod also has custom "iron sights" for 1st person aiming without the use of the crosshair, these actually work very well. Using these you will get the feel of actual aiming, as you will need to practice to judge distance for longer shots.[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60219/?]Nock to Tip Master Edition[/url] is required for this mod! You will use the features added by it to improve your bows, and craft them. The bows are sold in "Kits" which you can assemble at the Re-stringing station, with no other requirements. Kits are added to leveled list, and are only sold by vendors who carry the fletching supplies from Nock to Tip. Your current overall level determines which kits are for sale, since bows are divided in tiers, which increase damage.[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]Known issues:[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]The bows are gender specific![/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i](Only males can craft male bows)[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]This will only matter if you craft a bow and try to give it to a follower of the op. sex.[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]DO NOT DO THIS! ( it will work and is harmless, but draws will not match)[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]Please post any question/feedback in comments section, and endorse if you enjoy the mod.[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[color=#e06666][font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]Personal Note:[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][b][i]I would like to thank the users who have given donations, Thank You for your support.[/i][/b][/size][/font][/color]
author: Foster
